        public static <T extends PsiFileBase> T findInjectedFile(PsiElement expression,
                                                         java.lang.Class<T> classToFind)
        Deprecated. 
        Finds injected language in expression
        Type Parameters:
        T - class that represents language we look for
        Parameters:
        expression - where to find
        classToFind - class that represents language we look for
        Returns:
        instance of class that represents language we look for or null of not found

      • getCachedInjectedFileWithLanguage

        public static PsiFile getCachedInjectedFileWithLanguage(PsiElement element,
                                                        Language language)
        Deprecated. 

      • injectReference

        public static void injectReference(MultiHostRegistrar registrar,
                                   Language language,
                                   java.lang.String prefix,
                                   java.lang.String suffix,
                                   PsiLanguageInjectionHost host,
                                   TextRange rangeInsideHost)
        Deprecated. 
        Start injecting the reference in language in this place. Unlike MultiHostRegistrar.startInjecting(Language) this method doesn't inject the full blown file in the other language. Instead, it just marks some range as a reference in some language. For example, you can inject file reference into string literal. After that, it won't be highlighted as an injected fragment but still can be subject to e.g. "Goto declaraion" action.

      • reparse

        public static BooleanRunnable reparse(PsiFile injectedPsiFile,

        Deprecated.
